title: Circular motion - frictional force on coin

content.question: Which of the following vectors best represents the direction of the frictional force exerted on the coin by the disk when the coin is at the position shown?

choices.label: The figure shows an arrow pointing horizontally to the right.
The figure shows an arrow pointing horizontally to the left.
The figure shows an arrow pointing vertically downward.
The figure shows an arrow pointing vertically upward.

content.answer: The figure shows an arrow pointing horizontally to the right.
